snippet.title: Italian Wine
snippet.description: Vibrant, stylish, entertaining yet often frustrating â€¦ In Italy, that goes for the cars, the people and - guess what? - the wines. Explore Italian.., there are as many styles of wines as food. To see them at their best, try them with local dishes. Head to northwest Italy for the Nebbiolo-based Barolo and Barbaresco...
